name: Alolan Sandshrew

evolution.description: Alolan Sandshrew can evolve into Alolan Sandslash at level 7 and above with the help of an Ice Stone. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Mouse Pokémon. An ancient tradition of Alolan festivals, still carried on to this day, is a competition to slide Sandshrew across ice as far as one can.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Hail damage. It's AC is increased by 2 in arctic conditions, or when it is snowing or hailing.

abilities.name: Slush Rush
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Hail damage, and its speed is doubled in arctic conditions, or during a hailstorm.
